nl.strohalm.cyclos.struts

Class CyclosRequestProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts.action.RequestProcessor
      • org.apache.struts.tiles.TilesRequestProcessor
        • org.apache.struts.action.SecureTilesRequestProcessor
          • nl.strohalm.cyclos.struts.CyclosRequestProcessor

  • public class CyclosRequestProcessor
extends org.apache.struts.action.SecureTilesRequestProcessor
    Custom struts request processor. Among other things, we control the DB transactions here, opening a read-write transaction for action execution
    Author:
    luis
